#[[++

Copyright (C) 2019 Special Numbers developers

All rights reserved.

This file has been generated by the Automatic Component Toolkit (ACT) version 1.7.0-develop.

Abstract: This is an autogenerated CMakeLists file for the development of Special Numbers library.

Interface version: 1.0.0


]]

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.5)

### The implementation of the Special Numbers library component
project(Special)

set (CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)

# The location of autogenerated interfaces
set(CMAKE_CURRENT_AUTOGENERATED_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Interfaces)

file(GLOB SPECIAL_SRC
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Stub/*.cpp
)
file(GLOB SPECIAL_HDR
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Stub/*.hpp
)
set(SPECIAL_SRC ${SPECIAL_SRC} ${SPECIAL_SRC}
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_AUTOGENERATED_DIR}/special_interfaceexception.cpp
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_AUTOGENERATED_DIR}/special_interfacewrapper.cpp
)

add_library(special SHARED ${SPECIAL_SRC})
# Do not prefix the binary's name with "lib" on Unix systems:
set_target_properties(special PROPERTIES PREFIX "" IMPORT_PREFIX "" )
# The following two properties are crucial to reduce the number of undesirably exported symbols
set_target_properties(special PROPERTIES CXX_VISIBILITY_PRESET hidden)
set_target_properties(special PROPERTIES VISIBILITY_INLINES_HIDDEN ON)
# This makes sure symbols are exported
target_compile_options(special PRIVATE "-D__SPECIAL_EXPORTS")
target_include_directories(special PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_AUTOGENERATED_DIR})
target_include_directories(special PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Stub)
target_include_directories(special PRIVATE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../../Numbers_component/Bindings/CppDynamic")
target_include_directories(special PRIVATE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../../Numbers_component/Implementations/Cpp/Interfaces")
